text: I did not know that the school had a google review page if not I would have informed before. The school is very bad for conducive studying environment. He also bullies other students when possible. I know that my son is not bright and saint but he needs to do well this year so he can go to secondary school but seems like it is not possible. I am getting tuition in order for him to cope and understand better which does not come cheap as it is $50 per hour. Kindly think twice before sending your child to this primary school as it will be hard to change school later.
